welcome.sectionDescription: The new era of programing languages got me `hypnotized`, since there I am gladly following Codetap.academy's guidance and proudly getting on top of the latest technologies.

codetap.title: CodeTap
codetap.description: Get in contact with us and you will get top information regarding your code and the best mentorship in London.

skill.description: Light travels faster than sound. This is why some people appear bright until you hear them speak.
